item.description:

Some fans took to social media to wonder if there was some kind ofLove Island"curse" on the winners, noting that 2017's winners, Kem Cetinay and Amber Davies, announced their own split around the same time last year. The most recent series of Love Island, won by Dani Dyer and Jack Fincham, proved to be TV gold, smashing viewing records and providing the nation‚Äôs watercooler moments over the summer. Superdrug has been the headline sponsor of the past three series of the Majorca-set reality TV show, which the company has credited with driving sales of products including bronzer. item.title: Modern Love: Marooned on ‚ÄòLove Island‚Äô - The New York Times
item.description:
Modern Love: Marooned on ‚ÄòLove Island‚Äô  The New York Times

One of the greatest joys of my life is watching the British reality television program ‚ÄúLove Island,‚Äù a daily show in which six men and six women are placed in a luxury island villa, filmed constantly and encouraged to fall in love. The couple that wins the heart of the United Kingdom wins 50,000 British pounds. The concept is admittedly shallow and heteronormative, verging on dystopian. I did not miss an episode of ‚ÄúLove Island‚Äù during last summer‚Äôs blistering heat wave, the summer my life turned upside down. It didn‚Äôt matter how late I got home or how terrible I felt. When I was especiall...

item.title: Laura Anderson confirms new romance with former Love Island winner Max Morley - Her.ie
item.description:
Laura Anderson confirms new romance with former Love Island winner Max Morley  Her.ie

Way to keep it in the family, eh? Laura Anderson has confirmed that she is, in fact, dating former Love Island winner Max Morley. The 29-year-old air hostess took to IG Stories last night to share a video of herself and Morley kissing in the back of a taxi. They appeared to be drunk and were talking about Manchester United. The intimate footage shows Laura sitting on Max's lap asking: "How much do you love Man United, babe?" He responds: "Honestly I love them so much." Another clip documents Max singing along to Scouting For Girls's 'I Wish I was James Bond' before Laura cuts across saying:...

item.description:

Adverts for cosmetic surgery aired during episodes of ITV‚Äôs Love Island have been ruled ‚Äúirresponsible‚Äù and ‚Äúharmful‚Äù by the Advertising Standards Agency (ASA) following complaints from mental health groups. The Mental Health Foundation was one of 17 complainants to contact the ASA after adverts for MYA Cosmetic Surgery were aired, arguing they ‚Äúexploited young women‚Äôs insecurities‚Äù and ‚Äútrivialised‚Äù breast enhancement surgery. item.title: ITV chief: now is last chance to build British challenger to Netflix - The Guardian
item.description:
ITV chief: now is last chance to build British challenger to Netflix  The Guardian

The chief executive of ITV has said now is the last chance for UK broadcasters to build a British Netflix, as the US streaming giant continues to grow at breakneck speed. The warning from Carolyn McCall, chief executive of the UK‚Äôs largest free-to-air commercial broadcaster, follows protracted talks between the BBC, Channel 4 and ITV to create a credible domestic streaming rival to Netflix that have failed to bear fruit. McCall, who took over at ITV in January, has made developing a subscription video-on-demand service a priority ‚Äì to sit alongside existing free service ITV Hub and a paid-f...

Reality TV shows like Love Island send an ‚Äúunbelievably dangerous‚Äù message to young people about body appearance, a leading headteacher has said.
